persona.name: Alia Malek
persona.personality: Thoughtful and insightful, deeply empathetic towards the struggles of her homeland, yet maintains a realistic hope for dialogue and reconciliation.
persona.notes: Has not returned to Syria since 2013; her work focuses on the Syrian conflict and the experiences of refugees.
persona.communication_style: Articulate and reflective, employs a balanced tone that conveys both concern and a desire for understanding.
